update.foreach:
update elc_bills_t eb
eb.PAY_ = eb.AMOUNT_
eb.PAY_ = 0
where eb.BILL_NUM_ = #{item.billNum}

mapper.select: SELECT eb.ID_ billId, GROUP_CONCAT(ec.COURSE_CODE_) courseCode, GROUP_CONCAT(ct.NAME_) courseName, sum(ct.CREDITS_) credits, rc.UNIT_PRICE_ unitPrice, eb.BILL_NUM_ billNum, sum(ct.CREDITS_)*rc.UNIT_PRICE_ price, ec.PAID_ paid FROM elc_bills_t eb left JOIN student_t st on eb.STUDENT_ID_ = st.STUDENT_CODE_ left JOIN rebuild_course_charge_t rc on st.TRAINING_LEVEL_ = rc.TRAINING_LEVEL_ and st.FORM_LEARNING_ = rc.FORM_LEARNING_ left JOIN elc_course_takes_t_${index} ec on eb.ID_ = ec.BILL_ID_ left JOIN course_t ct on ec.COURSE_CODE_ = ct.CODE_ WHERE eb.STUDENT_ID_ = #{studentCode} and eb.CALENDAR_ID_ = #{calendarId} GROUP BY eb.ID_

SELECT eb.ID_ billId, ec.COURSE_CODE_ courseCode, ct.NAME_ courseName, ct.CREDITS_ credits, rc.UNIT_PRICE_ unitPrice, eb.BILL_NUM_ billNum, ct.CREDITS_*rc.UNIT_PRICE_ price, ec.PAID_ paid FROM elc_bills_t eb left JOIN student_t st on eb.STUDENT_ID_ = st.STUDENT_CODE_ left JOIN rebuild_course_charge_t rc on st.TRAINING_LEVEL_ = rc.TRAINING_LEVEL_ and st.FORM_LEARNING_ = rc.FORM_LEARNING_ left JOIN elc_course_takes_t_${index} ec on eb.ID_ = ec.BILL_ID_ left JOIN course_t ct on ec.COURSE_CODE_ = ct.CODE_ WHERE eb.ID_ = #{billId}
